mapper.select: SELECT tsm.partner_travel_style_id, tsm.match_status, tsm.description, ts.label AS partnerTravelStyleLabel FROM travel_style_match tsm LEFT JOIN travel_style ts ON ts.id = tsm.partner_travel_style_id WHERE tsm.travel_style_id = #{travelStyleId} AND tsm.match_status IS TRUE
